mapper.select: select r1.* from ( select gb.board_seq, gb.board_title, cu.custom_user_nick as board_writer, gb.board_text, date_format(board_mod_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS board_mod_date, gb.board_del_yn from general_board gb join custom_user cu on gb.board_writer = cu.custom_user_nick where board_del_yn = 'n' )r1 order by board_seq desc

select board_seq, custom_user_nick as board_writer, board_title, board_text, board_img_path from general_board gb join custom_user cu on gb.board_writer = cu.custom_user_nick where board_seq = #{board_seq};
mapper.insert:
select nextval(board_seq) from dual
insert into general_board values( #{board_seq}, #{board_title}, #{board_text}, #{board_writer}, default, default, #{board_img_path, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, default )
mapper.update: update general_board set board_title = #{board_title}, board_text = #{board_text}, board_mod_date = default, board_img_path = #{board_img_path} where board_seq = #{board_seq}
